snippet: A court sentenced two police officers for the killing of a man whose death was one of the sparks that set off the uprising against President Hosni Mubarak the following year.
abstract: Egyptian court sentences two police officers to 10 years in prison for the 2010 killing of Khaled Said, man whose death was one of the sparks that set off uprising against Pres Hosni Mubarak.
lead_paragraph: A court sentenced two police officers for the killing of a man whose death was one of the sparks that set off the uprising against President Hosni Mubarak the following year.

headline.main: Egypt: 2 Officers Sentenced to 10 Years for 2010 Killing
headline.print_headline: Egypt: Officers Sentenced to 10 Years for 2010 Killing
